publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1065 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that for Stage 3 of the Education and Training (Scotland) Bill, debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion at the following times – Amendments – no later than 1 hour 30 minutes after Stage 3 begins Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 2 hours after Stage 3 begins. Supported by: Iain Smith*
